personal.name: Manuj Rai
personal.title: Full-Stack Developer, Software Engineer
personal.summary: Full-stack developer specializing in React, .NET, Python and SQL Server. I build scalable enterprise modules at Fibre2Fashion, focusing on clean architecture, reusable UI components, optimized APIs, stored procedures, and automation. I deliver features with strong attention to detail, maintainability, and performance.

skills.languages: C#, TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL, HTML5, CSS3, Python, React, Node.js
skills.frameworks: ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Core, .NET Framework, Angular 14+, Node.js
skills.cloud: Azure App Service, Render, Vercel, Supabase
skills.tools: Git, Azure DevOps, GitHub, Postman, Swagger, IIS, Visual Studio, VS Code, FastAPI, Docker
skills.domains: ERP, SaaS modules, reporting systems, workflow automation, subscription management, AI, ML

job.title: Software Engineer
job.summary: Building and maintaining enterprise-grade modules across TexPro, ERP, and subscription systems. Work includes Angular UI development, ASP.NET backend APIs, and SQL Server stored proceduresâ€”ensuring stable releases, clean code, performance optimization, and scalable architecture.

achievements.item: Developed and optimized complex SQL procedures for TexPro modules with improved performance and cleaner logic.
Refactored controllers, repositories, and models to match clean folder architecture using separate header/data response patterns.
Implemented role-based access components using Angular and ASP.NET for secure feature-level permissions.
Improved subscription and user-access workflows by restructuring database queries and integrating stored procedures.

job.tech_stack: ASP.NET MVC, C#, Angular, Python, FastAPI, MongoDB, SQL Server, Stored Procedures, Azure DevOps, IIS, SourceTree

job.title: Full-Stack Developer
job.summary: Delivered multiple client-based web applications including portfolio sites, admin dashboards, and API-driven modules using Node.js, Python, FastAPI, .NET and React.

achievements.item: Built custom dashboards using React with role-based grids, reusable components, and REST APIs.
Delivered .NET-based backend services for customer portals and data-driven applications.
Developed portfolio websites and landing pages with optimized SEO, UI responsiveness, and fast loading times.

job.tech_stack: React, ASP.NET Core, C#, Python, FastAPI, SQL Server, Node.js

project.name: AI Resume Analyzer
project.description: Small-scale AI tool using Python + GPT APIs to extract structured data from resumes and evaluate candidate profiles.
project.impact: Reduced manual analysis time for early-stage screening by auto-summarizing resumes.

project.name: ERP Access Control Module
project.description: Built a role-based access control module for Fibre2Fashion using ASP.NET MVC and SQL Server with front-end Angular support.
project.impact: Improved accuracy and security of user-access workflows and reduced manual onboarding time.
project.tech_stack: ASP.NET MVC, C#, Angular, SQL Server

degree.program: Bachelor of Business Administration in Computer Applications (BBA-CA)

highlights.item: Strong foundation in programming, databases, and full-stack development.
Built academic projects using .NET, SQL, and Angular.
